user.title: Bitaxe Configuration
user.description: Configure the subnet to scan for Bitaxe miners and scanning options.

data_description.timeout: Timeout per probe in seconds (0.5-10, default: 1.5)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to re-scan for new miners. Set to 0 to disable periodic scanning.

discovery_none.title: No Miners Found
discovery_none.description: No Bitaxe miners were found in subnet {subnet}. You can still proceed to add miners manually, or go back to adjust the subnet.

select_miners.title: Select Miners
select_miners.description: Found {count} miner(s) in subnet {subnet}. Select which ones you want to monitor.

error.invalid_subnet: Invalid subnet format. Use CIDR notation (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24)
error.invalid_timeout: Timeout must be between 0.5 and 10 seconds
error.invalid_scan_interval: Scan interval must be 0 or greater
error.discovery_failed: Failed to discover miners. Check your network configuration.
error.no_miners_selected: Please select at least one miner
